equipment.name: Warlord Greathelm
strikethrough_affixes: When hit while not <text class='c_important'><u>Healthy</u></text>, a magical bubble is summoned around you for <text class='c_random'>5.39</text> seconds. While standing in the bubble, Players are <text class='c_important'><u>Immune</u></text>. Can only occur once every <text class='c_number'>135</text> seconds.
added_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>1.64%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>98.61%</text>.

equipment.name: Temerity
base_affixes: Effects that Heal you beyond <text class='c_number'>150%</text> Life grant you a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> up to <text class='c_random'>108.05%</text> of your Maximum Life that lasts for <text class='c_number'>12</text> seconds. Potions can be used while at full Life.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a 5% Chance to Heal +0.44 Life

equipment.name: Blood Artisan's Cuirass
base_affixes: When you pick up <text class='c_random'>7.5</text> <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text>, a free <text class='c_important'>Bone Spirit</text> is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.

equipment.name: Band
strikethrough_affixes:
Gain <text class='c_random'>36.67%</text> increased damage to a set of damage types for <text class='c_number'>1.5</text> seconds.  This effect alternates between <text class='c_number'>2</text> sets: 
<li>Fire, Lightning, and Physical. 
<li>Cold, Poison, and Shadow.
added_affixes: Gain <text class='c_random'>29.99%</text> increased Critical Strike Chance for <text class='c_number'>9</text> seconds when you cast <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>. You deal <text class='c_random'>59.98%</text> bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>.

equipment.name: Runic Gloves
base_affixes: Each cast of <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will launch an additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> at a Nearby enemy when it first hits an enemy that is already lanced, dealing <text class='c_random'>67.32%</text> of normal damage.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a 5% Chance to Heal +0.44 Life
strikethrough_affixes: +18% Critical Strike Chance Against Injured Enemies

equipment.name: Choker
base_affixes: +(0.8+0.6*2) Rank of the Coalesced Blood Passive
+27% Damage for VALUE2 Seconds After Killing an Elite
strikethrough_affixes: Damaging an Elite enemy grants you a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> absorbing up to <text class='c_random'>2.88</text> damage for <text class='c_number'>15</text> seconds. This effect can only happen once every <text class='c_number'>45</text> seconds.
added_affixes: Casting <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will consume <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text> to also conjure lances from them. Each additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> deals <text class='c_random'>65.56%</text> of normal damage and prioritizes targeting un-lanced enemies.

equipment.name: Flammard
strikethrough_affixes: Skills deal up to <text class='c_random'>26.87%</text> increased damage based on your available Primary Resource when cast, receiving the maximum benefit while you have full Primary Resource.
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Wave</text> fires two additional waves, each dealing <text class='c_random'>57.89%</text> less damage than the previous.

equipment.name: Runic Orb
base_affixes: +16.8% Critical Strike Chance Against Injured Enemies
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Bone Storm</text> consumes up to <text class='c_number'>11.2</text> Corpses to increase its duration by up to <text class='c_random'>9.93</text> seconds.
8.98% Damage Reduction from Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies
added_affixes: Attacking enemies with a <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skill increases the damage of your next <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skill cast by <text class='c_random'>13.58%</text>, up to <text class='c_number'>42%</text>.

equipment.name: Flickerstep
base_affixes: Each enemy you Evade through reduces your active Ultimate Cooldown by <text class='c_random'>4.32</text> seconds, up to <text class='c_number'>15</text> seconds.
